sourcesContent:
export const problems_background = {
    margin: 'auto',

    width: '70%',

    top: '10vh',
    height: '85vh',

    background: 'grey',
    opacity: '0.75',
    borderRadius: '20px'
}

export const problem_card_style= {
    ':focus':{
        borderBottom: '2px solid black'
    },
    opacity: '1',
    margin: 'auto',
    marginTop: '20px',
    background: 'green',
    width: '70%',
    // height: '20',
    borderRadius: '10px'
}

export const button_style= {
    textDecoration: 'none',
    outline: 'none',
    display: 'inline-block',
    padding: '12px 40px',
    margin: '10px 20px',
    borderRadius: '30px',
    backgroundImage: 'linear-gradient(45deg, #6ab1d7 0%, #33d9de 50%, #002878 100%)',
    backgroundPosition: '100% 0',
    backgroundSize: '200% 200%',
    fontFamily: 'Montserrat',
    fontSize: '24px',
    fontWeight: '300',
    color: 'white',
    boxShadow: '0 16px 32px 0 rgba(0,40,120,.35)',
    transition: '.5s',
    ':hover':{
        boxShadow: '0 0 0 0 rgba(0,40,120,0)',
        backgroundPosition: '0 0',
    }
}
